question: wene you make wado in bathroom if there is little carpets in the bathroom and u step on them do u have to wear slippers..
answer:
QUESTION

wene you make wado in bathroom if there is little carpets in the bathroom and u step on them do u have to wear slippers

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

As long as there is no impurity on the carpets one may step on them without wearing slippers.


And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum




Ml. Sajid bin Shabbir,
